name: ContentControl
description: Represents a content control. Content controls are bounded and potentially labeled regions in a document that serve as containers for specific types of content. Individual content controls may contain contents such as images, tables, or paragraphs of formatted text. Currently, only rich text content controls are supported.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets an integer that represents the content control identifier.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Gets or sets the title for a content control.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: Gets or sets a tag to identify a content control.

properties.name: placeholderText
properties.description: Gets or sets the placeholder text of the content control. Dimmed text will be displayed when the content control is empty.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Gets the content control type. Only rich text content controls are supported currently.

properties.name: subtype
properties.description: Gets the content control subtype. The subtype can be 'RichTextInline', 'RichTextParagraphs', 'RichTextTableCell', 'RichTextTableRow' and 'RichTextTable' for rich text content controls.

properties.name: appearance
properties.description: Gets or sets the appearance of the content control. The value can be 'boundingBox', 'tags' or 'hidden'.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Gets or sets the color of the content control. Color is specified in '#RRGGBB' format or by using the color name.

properties.name: removeWhenEdited
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the content control is removed after it is edited. Mutually exclusive with cannotDelete.

properties.name: cannotDelete
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can delete the content control. Mutually exclusive with removeWhenEdited.

properties.name: cannotEdit
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can edit the contents of the content control.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Gets the text format of the content control. Use this to get and set font name, size, color, and other properties.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Gets or sets the style used for the content control. This is the name of the pre-installed or custom style.

properties.name: paragraphs
properties.description: Get the collection of paragraph objects in the content control.

properties.name: contentControls
properties.description: Gets the collection of content control objects in the content control.

properties.name: parentContentControl
properties.description: Gets the content control that contains the content control. Returns null if there isn't a parent content control.

properties.name: inlinePictures
properties.description: Gets the collection of inlinePicture objects in the content control. The collection does not include floating images.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Gets the text of the content control.

properties.name: lists
properties.description: Gets the collection of list objects in the content control.

properties.name: tables
properties.description: Gets the collection of table objects in the content control.

properties.name: parentTableCell
properties.description: Gets the table cell that contains the content control. Returns null if it is not contained in a table cell.

properties.name: parentTable
properties.description: Gets the table that contains the content control. Returns null if it is not contained in a table.

methods.name: insertText
methods.description: Inserts text into the content control at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Required. The text to be inserted in to the content control.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Replace' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable' and 'RichTextTableRow' content controls.

methods.name: insertHtml
methods.description: Inserts HTML into the content control at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: Required. The HTML to be inserted in to the content control.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Replace' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable' and 'RichTextTableRow' content controls.

methods.name: insertOoxml
methods.description: Inserts OOXML into the content control at the specified location.  The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: ooxml
parameters.description: Required. The OOXML to be inserted in to the content control.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Replace' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable' and 'RichTextTableRow' content controls.

methods.name: insertFileFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts a document into the content control at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: base64File
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded content of a .docx file.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Replace' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable' and 'RichTextTableRow' content controls.

methods.name: insertParagraph
methods.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: paragraphText
parameters.description: Required. The paragrph text to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'. 'Before' and 'After' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable', 'RichTextTableRow' and 'RichTextTableCell' content controls.

methods.name: insertBreak
methods.description: Inserts a break at the specified location in the main document. The insertLocation value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'. This method cannot be used with 'RichTextTable', 'RichTextTableRow' and 'RichTextTableCell' content controls.

parameters.name: breakType
parameters.description: Required. Type of break.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertInlinePictureFromBase64
methods.description: Inserts an inline picture into the content control at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: base64EncodedImage
parameters.description: Required. The base64 encoded image to be inserted in the content control.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Replace', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Replace' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable' and 'RichTextTableRow' content controls.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the contents of the content control. The user can perform the undo operation on the cleared content.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the content control and its content. If keepContent is set to true, the content is not deleted.

parameters.name: keepContent
parameters.description: Required. Indicates whether the content should be deleted with the content control. If keepContent is set to true, the content is not deleted.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the content control. This causes Word to scroll to the selection.

parameters.name: selectionMode
parameters.description: Optional. The selection mode can be 'Select', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Select' is the default.

methods.name: getHtml
methods.description: Gets the HTML representation of the content control object.

methods.name: getOoxml
methods.description: Gets the Office Open XML (OOXML) representation of the content control object.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search with the specified searchOptions on the scope of the content control object. The search results are a collection of range objects.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Required. The search text.

parameters.name: searchOptions
parameters.description: Optional. Options for the search.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the whole content control, or the starting or ending point of the content control, as a range.

parameters.name: rangeLocation
parameters.description: Optional. The range location can be 'Whole', 'Start' or 'End'.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the content control into child ranges by using delimiters.
methods.signature: split(delimiters: string[], multiParagraphs: bool, trimDelimiters: bool, trimSpacing: bool)

parameters.name: delimiters
parameters.description: Required. The delimiters as an array of strings.

parameters.name: multiParagraphs
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether a returned child range can cover multiple paragraphs. Default is false which indicates that the paragraph boundaries are also used as delimiters.

parameters.name: trimDelimiters
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim delimiters from the ranges in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that the delimiters are included in the ranges returned in the range collection.

parameters.name: trimSpacing
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim spacing characters (spaces, tabs, column breaks and paragraph end marks) from the start and end of the ranges returned in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that spacing characters at the start and end of the ranges are included in the range collection.

methods.name: insertTable
methods.description: Inserts a table with the specified number of rows and columns into, or next to, a content control. The insertLocation value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'.
methods.signature: insertTable(rowCount: number, columnCount: number, insertLocation: string, values: string[][])

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of rows in the table.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of columns in the table.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Start', 'End', 'Before' or 'After'. 'Before' and 'After' cannot be used with 'RichTextTable', 'RichTextTableRow' and 'RichTextTableCell' content controls.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: getTextRanges
methods.description: Gets the text ranges in the content control by using punctuation marks andor space character.

parameters.name: punctuationMarks
parameters.description: Required. The punctuation marks and/or space character as an array of strings.

parameters.name: trimSpacing
parameters.description: Optional. Indicates whether to trim spacing characters (spaces, tabs, column breaks and paragraph end marks) from the start and end of the ranges returned in the range collection. Default is false which indicates that spacing characters at the start and end of the ranges are included in the range collection.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
